title: Spectrum Applications
description: You can extend the power of Cloudflare's DDoS, TLS, and IP Firewall to your other TCP-based services.

links.title: List Spectrum Applications
links.description: Retrieve a list of currently existing Spectrum Applications inside a zone.

page.description: Page number of paginated results. This parameter is required in order to use other pagination parameters. If included in the query, `result_info` will be present in the response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of results per page

order.description: Application field to order results by

links.title: Create Spectrum Application using an IP address for the origin
links.description: Create a new Spectrum Application from a configuration using an IP address for the origin.

protocol.description: Port configuration at Cloudflare’s edge. May specify a single port, e.g. `"tcp/1000"`, or a range of ports, e.g. `"tcp/1000-2000"`.

type.description: The type of DNS record associated with the application.

name.description: The name of the DNS record associated with the application.

dns.description: The name and type of DNS record for the Spectrum application.

origin_direct.description: A list of destination addresses to the origin.

items.description: Destination origin URI. May specify a single origin port, e.g. `"tcp://192.0.2.1:1000"`, or a range of origin ports, e.g. `"tcp://192.0.2.1:1000-2000"`.
items.cfNotes: If specifying a port range, the number of ports in the range must match the number of ports specified in the "protocol" field.

proxy_protocol.description: Enables Proxy Protocol to the origin. See [the developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/spectrum/getting-started/proxy-protocol/) for implementation details on PROXY Protocol V1, PROXY Protocol V2, and Simple Proxy Protocol.

ip_firewall.description: Enables IP Access Rules for this application.

tls.description: The type of TLS termination associated with the application.

type.description: The type of edge IP configuration specified. Dynamically allocated edge IPs use Spectrum anycast IPs in accordance with the connectivity you specify. Only valid with CNAME DNS names.

connectivity.description: The IP versions supported for inbound connections on Spectrum anycast IPs.

type.description: The type of edge IP configuration specified. Statically allocated edge IPs use customer IPs in accordance with the ips array you specify. Only valid with ADDRESS DNS names.

ips.description: The array of customer owned IPs we broadcast via anycast for this hostname and application.

edge_ips.description: The anycast edge IP configuration for the hostname of this application.

traffic_type.description: Determines how data travels from the edge to your origin. When set to "direct", Spectrum will send traffic directly to your origin, and the application's type is derived from the `protocol`. When set to "http" or "https", Spectrum will apply Cloudflare's HTTP/HTTPS features as it sends traffic to your origin, and the application type matches this property exactly.

argo_smart_routing.cfNotes: Only available for TCP applications with traffic_type set to "direct".
argo_smart_routing.description: Enables Argo Smart Routing for this application.

links.title: Create Spectrum Application using a name for the origin
links.description: Create a new Spectrum Application from a configuration using a name for the origin.

protocol.description: Port configuration at Cloudflare’s edge. May specify a single port, e.g. `"tcp/1000"`, or a range of ports, e.g. `"tcp/1000-2000"`.

type.description: The type of DNS record associated with the application.

name.description: The name of the DNS record associated with the application.

dns.description: The name and type of DNS record for the Spectrum application.

type.description: The type of DNS record associated with the origin. "" is used to specify a combination of A/AAAA records.

name.description: The name of the DNS record associated with the origin.

ttl.description: The TTL of our resolution of your DNS record in seconds.

origin_dns.description: The name and type of DNS record for the Spectrum application.

origin_port.description: The destination port at the origin. Only specified in conjunction with origin_dns. May use an integer to specify a single origin port, e.g. `1000`, or a string to specify a range of origin ports, e.g. `"1000-2000"`
origin_port.cfNotes: If specifying a port range, the number of ports in the range must match the number of ports specified in the "protocol" field.

proxy_protocol.description: Enables Proxy Protocol to the origin. See [the developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/spectrum/getting-started/proxy-protocol/) for implementation details on PROXY Protocol V1, PROXY Protocol V2, and Simple Proxy Protocol.

ip_firewall.description: Enables IP Access Rules for this application.

tls.description: The type of TLS termination associated with the application.

type.description: The type of edge IP configuration specified. Dynamically allocated edge IPs use Spectrum anycast IPs in accordance with the connectivity you specify. Only valid with CNAME DNS names.

connectivity.description: The IP versions supported for inbound connections on Spectrum anycast IPs.

type.description: The type of edge IP configuration specified. Statically allocated edge IPs use customer IPs in accordance with the ips array you specify. Only valid with ADDRESS DNS names.

ips.description: The array of customer owned IPs we broadcast via anycast for this hostname and application.

edge_ips.description: The anycast edge IP configuration for the hostname of this application.

traffic_type.description: Determines how data travels from the edge to your origin. When set to "direct", Spectrum will send traffic directly to your origin, and the application's type is derived from the `protocol`. When set to "http" or "https", Spectrum will apply Cloudflare's HTTP/HTTPS features as it sends traffic to your origin, and the application type matches this property exactly.

argo_smart_routing.cfNotes: Only available for TCP applications with traffic_type set to "direct".
argo_smart_routing.description: Enables Argo Smart Routing for this application.

links.title: Get Spectrum Application Configuration
links.description: Get the application configuration of a specific application inside a zone.

links.title: Update Spectrum Application Configuration using an IP address for the origin
links.description: Update a previously existing application's configuration that uses an IP address for the origin.

object_definition.title: Spectrum Applications
object_definition.description: You can extend the power of Cloudflare's DDoS, TLS, and IP Firewall to your other TCP-based services.
